name: Anuj Gosalia
designation: Co-founder & CEO at Terribly Tiny Tales

articles.title: Our Nature
articles.description: In nature's embrace, whispers of wisdom unfold, Where the sun paints the sky in hues of gold. Amidst the rustling leaves and rivers that roam, Life's timeless lessons, in every breeze, find home.
